page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN MELKSHAM
page.content: Unemployment is a serious problem nationwide. However, Melksham's unemployment is not as serious as some places like the North of England. The biggest employer in the town is the Avon rubber factory. The GEC is quite a big business too. These people make parts for engines, tractors, cars and lorries. Throughout Melksham there are shops which employ some people full time. Supermarkets like Gateway, Spar and International employ people to stack shelves and put prices on tins. The West of England Farmers has been knocked down and now by the Scout Hut the builders are making a new shopping area. This should make Melksham more popular for shopping and visiting.
